meanings.definition: Failure to receive something that was expected or due.
meanings.sent1: The nonreceipts of the package caused frustration for the customer.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't prove her nonreceipts of the letter without a tracking number.
meanings.sent3: The nonreceipts of the invitation led to a mix-up in the party planning.
meanings.sent4: His nonreceipts of support from his friends left him feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The nonreceipts of the scholarship letter dashed her hopes of attending college.

meanings.definition: A lack of receipts or proof of payment.
meanings.sent1: The nonreceipts in the accounting records raised suspicions of fraud.
meanings.sent2: Without nonreceipts, it was hard to track the expenses for tax purposes.
meanings.sent3: The nonreceipts in the shoe store caused confusion during the audit.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreceipts of the grocery bill made it challenging to balance the budget.
meanings.sent5: The nonreceipts of the online purchase made it difficult to process a return.
